title: The Wings of eagles
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Military life
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/United States - Armed forces
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Biographical films
description: The story is based on the life of Spig Wead, a pioneer aviator, renowned screenwriter. He scripted two of Ford's films and was a personal friend. Spig is unable to combine his career and marriage. The exuberance of the early scenes of inter-service rivalry and the pursuit of glory rings hollow in what is basically an unattractive portrait of military life. Following the breakdown of his marriage and a crippling accident, Wead is overtaken by a profound sense of failure and loss. Cast includes John Wayne, Dan Dailey, Maureen O'Hara, Ward Bond.
